title: TURBO MODE: The Data Behind Your Spell Spamming

replies.body:
Kinda expected

{{summoner:4}} What about summoner spell stats?
Here's one specifically about Flash that you mentioned: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/keybind-wars-which-key-best-flash
http://imgur.com/a/oXOSd All champions. Sorry for hijacking your post
This is what i came for
Already been done in a past post.
So we can look at Koreans spam graphs but Graves can't have his cigar?{{champion:103}} you srs?
theres always a  grave meme everywhere
He actually vapes, Cactopus said so.
that pun made me get up and walk away from my computer. have a cookie.{{item:2054}}
That's interesting. I thought you meant you can find data about yourself and the spells you use.... awkward
Me too >.>
me three >.<
Me four <.<

If (and i think this is generally true) lower ranked players die more, they cannot perform riven's combo while dead, so that curve will naturally come about. The graphs themselves mean nearly nothing without the proper scale next to them, it could be that line representing 1 cast per minute, or 1.01 casts per minute but when zoomed in like that it seems more impressive.

That could be true, but it kinda balances out because higher ranked players don't go for as aggressive plays and generally won't panic as hard and button mash so this could just be lower ranked players saving their abilities for too long? I do agree with you though, and I was thinking the same thing. I'd like to see an estimated graph with these factors taken into consideration, but that would be very hard to gauge and would almost certainly never happen.
So when can I get all of these numbers in a spreadsheet? :)
Where is the stats on my Girls!!!!! Soraka {{champion:16}} and Miss Fortune {{champion:21}} and my main man Braum {{champion:201}}
excellent break down I'd love to see more stats!
Could we maybe have button-press graphs for some/most/all champions above like an x% playrate? I'm especially curious about the management of w on Ekko and q/e with Ahri.

Can you PLEASE add a 'spell queue' like World of Warcraft. One of the biggest hindrances to playability and quality of life is that spells do not go off unless the GCD was completely finished when you cast it.  If you hit the next spell .05 seconds early it should queue.  I cry every time I see that person run away on 10 health and my ignite is still up. Crappy, fluctuating Gold Coast ADSL internet doesn't help!
Ahaha please don't make lol anything like wow. Wow is only fun pve.

I feel like this post sums up lol, it's community and it's mid term future...  there are enough people happy with it, why bother?  There are so many simple tweaks the game could make to improve smoothness of playability and satisfaction but they won't come for a few more years until those distracted by new content get bored of the prettiness and demand it.  Took wow 10 years, like you say.  PVP was walk in, get chain CC'd and die, until a recent overhaul.  I've checked the game every year since BC to see if it was fun to play again and it's finally safe to go back.  They addressed all the little things and fixed them.  Loving it again at the moment and wonder when lol will have the same epiphone.  Kinda praying they will because I love the MOBA format

wow has a spell queue of close to 0.5 sec and that will be way too long. If Riot need to do a spell queue for ability, I think the difference will only be maximum of 0.1sec. Sometimes I think there is no spell queue since I saw plenty of ppl spamming almost all ability at once.
Most of those graphs if you just thought logically about it, they should be obvs.

The charts are great and all, but they are practically pointless on their own.
Some way of looking at individual data would be nice.
It is better to run a regression analysis by introducing more control variables. The chart (or called univariate analysis) would not be convincing as too many factors are affecting the final result.
lets look at faker yay{{champion:136}}
I use C E W D instead of Q W E R so it did not include me.
How the actual hell?
what about {{champion:55}} ?

Allot of riven players use there Q constantly returning to lane or roaming between lanes or just turret hugging or just cause bored.

Rivens Q was probably a bad example.

Karma would be interesting though and Ahri and also would be cool if you could show the stats from bronze to diamond of lane harras from adc auto attack/spells etc.
I'd love to see Lux and/or Sona's QWER sequence data.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
I've never pressed those buttons once
What about {{champion:81}}  Q's? Percentage hit in different mmr, or even if the number used is different between mmr.
I know this probably isn't the place to say it but... I haven't been able to comment on the nexus. For some reason the comment section is always telling me to login, even when I am.
I wanna see how many times {{champion:75}} uses q in a game, would be kinda funny to see

I'm a Lux main {{champion:99}} <3 and I seem to spam my w a lot, even if it's not really necessary, I'm currently in silver so I'm very curious see a graph about this spell and see if it gets higher or lower with rank.
The graph I'd like to see is {{champion:15}} E.
My W (stun) is broken from all the {{champion:80}} carry.
ok high elo players are more patient, good job riot. now can we have tribunal plz
Wanted to see cassiopeia and other spammy abilities xD
Would of liked to see {{champion:157}} e statistic because of all the bronze idiots that spam e on every single minion in lane without considering what an escape is.
Yasuo E?

I'm curious about mid lane champion skill shots like Ahri's charm, Leblanc's chain and Ryze's W. Does the frequency of those spells cast increase with MMR like top lane champions or decrease like support utilities?
They decrease or should be decreased. Those are game changing abilities so its better to hold it rather than spam it.

You promised me interesting charts, i only got one for a champion i actually enjoy in Thresh, and i already knew that one fairly well.

Give us the rest of the charts to look at man.
It would be nice if Riot could include LPL stats in comparison.
Would love to have a search bar like the lunch table, where we could look at and compare each champ separately,also wouldn't mind some personal stats

So basically this was an information drop on what people do not a golden ratio on how to play better :(. Also just before people point out that the golden ratio is different i do know what it is but it has gold in the name and it sounded cool in the sentience. in addition to this you would not have even noticed the word if i hadn't given an explanation on what it is there for. Furthermore i have spent more words explaining my sentience then were in the sentience thus you can observe that this person does, in-fact, go to university and type out essays.
